Read More Next Meet Tacoma's "Husky 100" students Husky Highlights Main Content Confirmation deadline is June 1 If you've been admitted, the confirmation deadline is June 1 this year. There's also still time to apply for Autumn 2024 for both first-year and transfer students! You Should Know Commencement 2024 UW Diversity Blueprint HuskiesCare Collaborating to End Mass Violence May 6, 2024 The Violence Prevention and Transformation Research Collaborative, led by Dr. Eric Madfis, is calling for a new approach to prevent and assess threats of school and other mass violence. School of Education Welcomes First Undergraduate Students March 22, 2024 The B.A. in Education degree begins a new era in the school’s 32-year history. UW Tacoma Joins National Engineering Network March 20, 2024 UW Tacoma has been accepted into KEEN, the Kern Entrepreneurial Engineering Network, dedicated to training engineers to have an entrepreneurial mindset.
